comment: This lemma is used to prove the existence of a function p_t as in the beginning of Lemma 1 [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 90: for all t in T - U, there exists a function p in the subalgebra, such that p_t ( t_0 ) = 0 , p_t ( t ) > 0, and 0 <= p_t <= 1.
